title: If you can
body: If you can, can you give 19 RP, i have 956 and i want to get a 975 skin eventually (how I got this RP was I got my friend Cosmic Reaper Kassadin). So if you can that'd be pretty cool, plus, my birthdays on the 29 (not trying to make you feel bad or anything) but if you can't, that's cool.

replies.body:
Heya **DragoneelX**,

As this is an account-specific issue, we can't directly help you on the boards. However, you do have a much better chance [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with Riot Games Player Support! 

Here are some things to keep in mind as you submit your ticket:

1. Player Support has no obligation to fulfill the request. 
2. You'll have a much better chance of getting the RP you need if you submit a drawing you made of a champion (or so I've heard).
3. If you do get an RP grant, you won't be able to request it in the future. These grants are given at maximum, once per account per lifetime. 

With that being said, good luck!

Hey there :) You may want to Tweet @riotsupport to help you with this predicament! They are fast but it does come with a price ...like a drawing, a poem, a haiku. Idk what they will tell you to do cuz they're getting preeettty creative! {{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
